website_summaries.verdict: A luxurious, high-end bedding set made from 100 percent Egyptian cotton. Lightweight and incredibly soft.
pros: We love the handy non-slip corner ties and hidden button fasteners that keep your duvet in place
Crafted from non-fade material for long lasting colors
cons: Takes a couple of washes to soften up

customer_reviews.title: Awesome duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful duvet cover. I would definitely recommend and would buy again. It keeps you cool at night, but would still be warm in the winter. It comes with corner ties and buttons to get a duvet insert in. Does not come with insert. Just posting for reference because these were some questions that I personally had, is shiny and girly which I loved. True to size - I ordered in Rose Gold
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the color. I ordered the Ocean Teal and found the listing photos to be pretty accurate. It arrived in a high-end box, and the duvet cover was in a tote made of the same fabric. I washed it right away, and like other reviewers mentioned, it did lose some sheen, and was quite wrinkled. I took the time to iron it and it looks great. Nice, breathable fabric, and the corner ties help keep the duvet in place. The buttons are not my favorite; they seem to have some trouble staying buttoned. But overall, I’m very satisfied with my purchase and would gladly recommend it to anyone. Just have an iron ready.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I write this review as I lay underneath this insanely comfortable duvet. I understand I’m simply reviewing the cover set here, but in all honesty? I don’t think it would matter what you put in it. I was so hesitant to spend as much money as I did on this. Buyers remorse was real...until it arrived. The color is perfect and the fabric it’s made out of is heavenly. If you’re debating, stop. Buy it. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and softness
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this cover. It came in a really fancy looking box and was very soft. After the first wash it does feel a little stiff, however a little fabric softener and it was just as soft as before I washed it. The navy color is a very saturated and royal in pigment and didn’t fade at all with washing.
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: My search is over......
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love............If you having been looking for the perfect duvet cover, look no more! I bought and returned so many that I have lost count. This one is everything I was looking for. Beautiful and so soft! The corner ties made it so simple to put on. The dark slate is more of a blueish gray but that was exactly what I was looking for. The packaging it came in made it seem like it was way more expensive than it was. I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Product Detail for Size is Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: The product detail says this duvet cover is 90x92. It is not! The first one I ordered was 86x88. I returned it. I contacted the company to confirm the size; they didn't respond. I ordered a 2nd one hoping the first one was a one-off. Nope, this is also smaller than advertised. You need to correct your product details!!!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love this duvet! The packaging it came in was so classy. It’s really pretty and soft. It has fabric ties in the corners to hold your comforter in place and was only a little wrinkled when it arrived. Wrinkles fell out in approximately 2 days. Washed well. No pilling. Again slightly wrinkled after wash, but wrinkles again fell out pretty quickly. The color is gorgeous ( I got the purple/grey forget the name online) and love it. Price was very fair for quality. I’ll be buying more colors ASAP. If your thinking about buying this duvet, just do it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: morgan burke

customer_reviews.title: Poor Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and the fabric. Unfortunately, the button holes were cut too short for the buttons to fit, so I could not actually close the cover around the duvet, and eventually it slipped out. I ordered a replacement hoping this was a fluke, only to have the exact same problem happen again. So now I have to return both. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pane

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function
customer_reviews.text: I have Velvet drapes so I wanted a duvet with texture, but that wouldn’t bring down the room with heaviness. This duvet has a light airy texture, quality thread count, and a subtle sheen that adds an element of class and beauty. It is easy to put on and remove. I will be buying one or two more in different colors for variety. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a King sized Pine Green duvet cover. The color is as exactly as pictured, and is really beautiful. It is a deep teal, not at all what I imagine "pine green" to look like, so the name definitely doesn't fit the color. It is soft and light, and is so far holding up very well, though I have yet to put a duvet inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy M

customer_reviews.title: Not even remotely what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews... but I was so disappointed. I purchased this in Pine Green which is advertised as a sateen, very dark cool-toned green. I got this instead. It's not sateen - it's this flimsy, crinkled material. It also has a giant tag sewn on it. Also, it's SO much lighter than advertised. Within one minute of opening box I filed a return.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Will need to iron. Looking for a better way to dewrenkle.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product a 5-star review because I love the color. It is easy to wash and dry but not easy to get wrinkles out of. I have had to iron this twice since having it so it is not wrinkle friendly. It also is a hair magnet if you have a dog unfortunately. But no one else had a true pine needle green colored comforter or duvet. And I wanted to bring Oregon back into my home since I don't get to be in my home state.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price scare you, it's worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky when it comes to what I put on my bed, I was looking for luxury and that's what I got. I'm not going to lie, I was a bit put off by the price but I love this duvet, the color is beautiful. The material is so soft. It came in a very nice box, with a cloth carrying/storage bag. My only complaint is it wrinkles very easily. Still giving it 5 stars for the amazing quality. Will definitely buy again next time I change my room up. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful. This duvet surpassed my standards
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. This duvet surpassed my standards. Upon arrival, it came neatly folded and had a very lustrous look. At first, I was a bit worried it was not going to be as soft as I was expecting but after giving it a quick wash(delicate!) it is now one of the softest duvet covers I have ever owned. Tag does read that is Egyptian cotton .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kluck

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft, well made and just plain lovely
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this duvet! The fabric is wonderfully soft, the corner ties are sewn in very well, the buttons don't randomly come undone so there is no worry about the feather blanket spewing out <-- this was a genuine concern of mine lol! I have washed and dried my duvet several times since purchasing and it always comes out beautifully. I will most definitely be purchasing a second duvet!
customer_reviews.author: Eli & Samantha Askin

customer_reviews.title: I eyeballed this for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I love this duvet cover. The beautiful rose shade is perfect. I literally eyeballed and stalked this duvet cover for 6 months. I waited for it to go on sale and it didn’t. I was worried that it wouldn’t be worth the money. But it’s perfect. It’s a lightweight cover, completely opaque; the cover and the sham cases are high quality. They wash and dry well. I took them straight from the dryer to the insert there was no need to iron that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing when product presents as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I do not do reviews often but I have to say this duvet cover presented with excellent quality! My order came in very quickly and was packaged extremely well duvet cover came in cardboard box wrapped in quite nice tissue paper. After opening duvet was in a little cloth bag which was a very nice touch. The color and look of the fabric matched exactly to the picture used for advertisement. I highly recommend an order from this company if you’re looking for high-quality duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Caronna

customer_reviews.title: Can Handel Three Large Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for several months now and it has held up really well to my three large dogs. Because it is light in color it does show all dirt or stains but it come out of the washer looking brand new! It also softens with each wash. I was trying to find a cover that was fashionable but still would hold up to animals and this is it! I also, love the color, it is very accurate to the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Wolff

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Duvet!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% would buy again. Love this so much. i can sleep directly on it or under it. it’s the perfect material, it’s not to soft and it’s not scratchy. i am the person always looking for the cold side of the pillow and this duvet always gives me a cold side of the bed. absolute love. i’m ordering another one! the color is NOT as bright or silky as the pictures show. i was actually very disappointed when it arrived but the color is still amazing so i’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I spent months researching bedding, and finally bit the bullet and went with this. From the packaging it arrived in, to using it now 6 months later, I have not been disappointed. I plan on buying another one in a different color in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Katshia

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive at first with the price, but I’m really glad I went for it. It’s the exact color I wanted and it is soft and cozy. I love it. After you wash it the bedding will be wrinkled but when a few days pass it wrinkles will smooth out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle E.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, super soft, great material, I love it! But also attracts cat hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover the blue ocean color is gorgeous. It lost most of its silky shine after the first wash but still has bright beautiful color. It's super soft and good quality material. Its light weight and doesn't make me sweat while I sleep, so I'm happy about that. The only thing I dislike is that it's like a cat hair magnet. I have to constantly use a lint roller and a de-hair brush. And put blankets where my cat sleeps. But other than that I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and looks very high end! Only downside is pet hair sticks to it really bad. I would recommend a lighter color is you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: angelina

customer_reviews.title: Very soft material
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover fits great on our king sized bed. Its very soft and easy to put on. The color looks just like the picture. Def. worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Foote

customer_reviews.title: I died!! This is omg!
customer_reviews.text: Just saw the item after getting delivered today, and damn, I died! This duvet cover is the most luxurious/quality material-made I’ve ever owned. The price is totally worth it. The sheen adds up beautifully to the totality of this item’s awesomeness.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudine Icky

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this duvet cover. It is soft, silky, beautiful color. The only thing is...if you have cats...do not let them sit on this. It is a cat hair magnet.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality duvet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this duvet cover! It is so soft yet feels extremely durable. Washed it right when I got it, which was fast shipping with prime, and there are a bit of wrinkles, not too bad. Picture above show right after the wash. It just makes for an amazing sleep. Also I’m in love with the color! Plum
customer_reviews.author: Qiana

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the COLOR is just that!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set. Color is true to images. The box packaging is elevated as well which scores extra points with me. Not the biggest fan of button closures but I specifically wanted this color/saturation and can sacrifice an invisible zipper. The set laundered nicely out of the box and drys very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Carteris

customer_reviews.title: Great color, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product, and the exact color I was looking for. It’s definitely more lilac than grey. When it first arrives the smell (that new smell bedding/pillows sometimes have) is definitely present, recommend washing it before use. It’s also satin-feeling, which I didn’t like and resulted in me nearly returning it. I gave it a week, however and it’s now quite soft and very comfortable, yet not like cotton so it keeps me quite cool in bed. Ultimately really happy I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Barry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Beautiful color! Realllllly small for my bed, and I’m not sure why, as I purchase the appropriate size.
customer_reviews.author: MelbaToasty

customer_reviews.title: Quality and confort
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived on time and well packaged. The duvet cover was in a nice box. The color was exactly what I ordered and the duvet cover fitted perfectly. The quality of the Egyptian cotton and the sateen aspect make that duvet cover the real deal. My children were impressed by the softness and how well you sleep in a cotton duvet cover! I definitively recommend that company and will buy an another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mom At Home

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bedding
customer_reviews.text: I liked the mint sky version so well I bought the rose color too. It's soft and beautiful. The fabric does wrinkle easily which is great for a soft, inviting, casual look when paired with a fluffy, luxurious down comforter. I love these duvet sets. The two colors I have are calm and peaceful making my bedroom my favorite getaway.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Kalmbach

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious set
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality product. The color is beautiful, just like in the picture. I ordered grey lilac. The stitching looks nice, no threads sticking out. It has a buttoned closure at the foot end of it and it has ties in each corner. The pillow cases are also very well made. The set looks luxurious and is worth the money. I’m keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Liliya

customer_reviews.title: Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this comforter for a spare bedroom. It looks great and feels soft but has not been used yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda James

customer_reviews.title: Solid Duvet
customer_reviews.text: I got the duvet in navy blue, and it's solidly navy blue. Like others have mentioned, the amazing sheen when you first unbox it doesn't last through the first washing. The duvet isn't particularly soft, but it's what I expect from this type of fabric. I don't iron my cloths, so there was never any chance that I'd be ironing this bedding. I'm not entirely sure why people would think anything made out of 100% cotton would exit a dryer wrinkle free, but yes, it came out super wrinkled. After I put it over my comforter and on my bed, it almost completely smoothed out and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Joyous

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous and luxurious! Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! Washed and machine dried right out of the shoot, no shrinking, no wrinkles. Very plush and silky soft cotton with a bit of a lovely sheen that gives it a luxurious tone. Color plum is very true to picture on Amazon. Couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tanath Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Mustard yellow not Honey Mustard yellow
customer_reviews.text: This seems like something I'd love except the color seems to bring down the mood of my room. I wanted a vibrant color, this isn't. It's regal, mature, lux. I want my room to look more playful. I thought the color would work because one of the reviews said it looked like a mustard bottle. No it doesn't. This duvet has a more goldish tone.
customer_reviews.author: C.Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Size not accurate post wash
customer_reviews.text: Presentation in box was nice. Texture and fabric is fine. Loving the color. Chose the dusty rose/cedarwood. My only real complaint comes after post initial wash/dry. I specifically ordered a Queen size for my Double bed to allow for a little overlap since I like my sheets and tops to have a little more coverage. Once the duvet cover was washed and dried.......it BARELY fit my double bed! Definitely couldn’t fit my down insert inside. I have a Queen duvet that’s over two years washed and worn for comparison and this cover doesn’t measure the same now. I’m disappointed, as I was hoping NOT to make a return for this reason. Guess I need to order a King size?
customer_reviews.author: Logan Saltsman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible after washing
customer_reviews.text: The color Violet Iris is actually just a purple grey color, the exact same product can be found here with a more accurate picture of the color:  However this is not Egyptian cotton, it feels more like polyester after washing it. It should get softer with each wash, but it gets worse. I ordered both products and they seem like the same thing, but one has buttons and one has a zipper. Returning both items because they are not the quality as described.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT!!!!! Exactly the same color as the pictures. Very soft and supple as expected for the type of material. Beautiful packaging! I am a forever customer!
customer_reviews.author: S. Brenegan

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cozy, beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Color was very close to matching the picture, was just a little brighter. It is very soft and my comforter fit inside it well. Very stylish and big enough to fit two people under the covers. My dog chewed a hole in it already (sigh) but I am very likely to buy a replacement. I just bought it though so will be a while.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Buttery soft and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I washed mine and they aren't wrinkly and the color is still the same. For those who aren't aware, egyptian cotton gets softer with time. Since we have had these a few months they are now buttery soft and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - caution with color
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but - it is not wrinkle free. The color is the biggest discrepancy. I picked the violet iris - and it is a MUCH more vivid purple shade than the pictures portray. I took a pic with my iPhone, and was in process of uploading to the website - when I noticed it washed the color out. We all know this happens - just pretty dramatic with this particular color. I do not blame the manufacturer - Iris is a good descriptor when you are thinking about the purple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality duvet at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: These duvets are exactly what I’ve been looking for. I wanted something lightweight, 100% cotton and in a solid color. Jackpot! I love the color selection because you can get something bold or more muted. I went with the mauve and it’s a very soft purpley grey. I will definitely buy this again in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nony

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean got a lower rating bc no duvet is easy to clean! This is a gorgeous duvet cover, true to color and so soft. It’s came packaged like a Christmas present. I would definitely purchase another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fulford

customer_reviews.title: Ready to order more!!!
customer_reviews.text: Light and very high quality. Low tumble dry upon receipt (I also use wool balls) for 20 minutes.Wrinkle free and lovely color, exactly as described. Packaging was very classy and thoughtful. Couldn't be more pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Farms

customer_reviews.title: Very nice duvet for the price
customer_reviews.text: The packaging of this duvet is so fancy I was really surprised. When I pulled it out of the box it was so so soft. After washing before putting on the bed it lost a lot of the softness and is really wrinkly so I see what other are saying. Still giving it a 5 star because it’s still really nice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. It was extremely soft when it first arrived but because less soft after washing. Would still purchase again. I would recommend watching a video on YouTube on how to easily put on a duvet cover. I can get my kind size duvet on in less than five minutes by myself.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Soft, silky, beautiful color! Wrinkles easily.
customer_reviews.text: Turned out super cute! I bought the twilight mauve and I am actually going to return it. Only because it turned out to be darker than I was expecting. I want a more pink color and this was more purple. Still very pretty, just not for me! Gave 4 stars because it does wrinkle pretty easily. I only had it on for about an hour before I decided I wanted to return it, and it was already very wrinkly.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: ... I decided on this one and boy am I glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about buying a Duvet instead of a typical comforter but after much research I decided on this one and boy am I glad I did. Its super comfortable and the material feels and looks high quality. would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Premier599

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is sooo silky and the color is perfect. The packaging was a lovely surprise as well. I only wish that Eikei sold more products.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine L.

customer_reviews.title: Lost it’s softness; darker than photo
customer_reviews.text: The green was much darker than the photo. I was really excited at first when it came in this luxurious box. Out of the package it was really soft but after the first wash, it lost most of the softness. The clear plastic buttons were cheap. I ended up buying a duvet at Walmart for $24 that has the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: crazylady86

customer_reviews.title: Very nice feeling fabric and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in mauve. I thought it came with a patterned throw pillow as pictured but it did not. Very nice feeling fabric and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Good but look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is good but not the best. For the price I was honestly expecting higher quality. I have other "Egyptian cotton" sheets and they are much softer and smoother than this duvet which claims to be Egyptian cotton. This duvet feels a bit scratchy. The packaging was very nice, but it came with creases and wrinkles and even after washing they still remain. Overall it is good but if you are looking for a silky smooth feel, spend your money somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pink
customer_reviews.text: This set is so cool literally keeps me cool just like I like it soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: You get what you see
customer_reviews.text: I never write comments, but WOW this duvet cover blew my mind. It's silky soft, the color is bold, and the packaging is very professional, which made me chuckle. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hess

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited about about my new duvet cover but was very dissapointed once I received it. It isnt very soft and collects lots of lent and dust even after washing and using dryer sheets. To be advertised as Egyptian Cotton is very misleading. Unfortunately, I am very unhappy with this purchase. I went off reviews thats why i was willing to spend the money on this. If youre expecting an Egyptian Cotton feel, id look elsehwere.
customer_reviews.author: Cannon Benfield

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it the only thing I find is that I have to take a lint brush across it daily because it attract it. Mind you I do not have pet hair lingering.
customer_reviews.author: Rosina

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Pros: keeps your body cool, the price Cons: not that soft and still wrinkles, color differs from photo Hoping the material will get softer after washing it more times. I got it in the color “bone.” The color wasn’t at all what I expected. I thought it would be more of an off white color. In person, the color seems more of a taupe color. There’s a bit of a sheen to it. I wasn’t happy with the color because it didn’t match the photo. I took 3 photos, one in natural daylight. The other two at night with light (without flash and with flash).
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Thin Fabric
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this duvet. It’s a beautiful color and cake nicely packaged however it ripped within a week. It wasn’t on a seam or anything it’s right across the middle. I the fabric is too thin. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find copper color sheet.. 100% cotton..
customer_reviews.text: I needed a deep, rich color to pickup the deep colors of my bedroom rug... in he copper color is quite original and I was looking for this exact color.. very satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan! Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know, but now I know. This material isn’t soft at all and it’s not wrinkle resistant either. It feels like linen to me when I brush my hand against it. I know softness is in the eye of the beholder, but I’ve always heard Egyptian Cotton is the softest. My skin says otherwise. I went with a top brand of microfiber on the amazons best selling list once I purchased this duvet and I wish I would have gotten the microfiber first. I would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: REB

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft, not meant for animals
customer_reviews.text: Only has 4 loops inside was hoping for more. Also, as another reviewer has mentioned it will collect animal hair quickly. One night has proved that review to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Burton

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for the product. Purchased 6 months ago and I already need a replacement. Stains easily and has started pilling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luscious
customer_reviews.text: The dark green color is gorgeous, and the material has a lovely sheen. Very soft, cool, and beautiful. With a down comforter inside, I stay warm but not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Kirby

customer_reviews.title: High quality, gorgeous chartreuse color
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover set looked nice coming out of the package. Color is beautiful. I washed them before using, and they came out of the dryer full of wrinkles. It took me over an hour to iron. Once on the bed, they look great. Wrinkle free would be nice. Update: after washing a second time I air dried in the sun. Very few wrinkles! A too-hot dryer was likely the problem. These covers remain lustrous and beautiful, with a high quality look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and they are so soft and comfy a must for any bed they wash well and dry well
customer_reviews.author: walter lee

customer_reviews.title: Super soft. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with duvet cover. I bought the CA king in chartreuse. Very pretty and vibrant. Super soft. I wouldn’t say wrinkle free after washing but did not have to iron it. Great quality for the cost. I would buy another color when I want to change it up
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Gast

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, beautiful duvet cover.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful duvet cover. Love the color! It does wrinkle but I think that adds character t its appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Lint Magnet
customer_reviews.text: While beautiful for the first few days, this thing is a fuzz magnet and sure to it's dark color almost never looks good. I would return it off I could. It washed well but between my cat, a fuzzy bathrobe, and any linty clothing or towels that may touch this fabric, it only looks decent for a few hours. And it would look MUCH better ironed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the color advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a specific deep wine red color. What arrived was a bright, fire engine red comforter that clashes with everything in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my comforter well, looks pretty on my bed. It also collects a lot of lint but it's nothing a lint roller can't fix. Maybe after a few washings, it'll get better.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is a little hard after wash and dry for the first time, but it gets better with washes. It is my 2nd time purchasing and keeping these duvet cover and sham. I bought the gray charcoal in the past and now the all white ones all in king size. Price is amazing for this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The color was very true to the picture. Amazing softness and comfort. Overall size is bigger than a king comforter but definitely worth the money. Makes you wanna stay in bed all day
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love it's high quality and impressed by the elegant package
customer_reviews.text: I love it's high quality and impressed by the elegant package. The reason that I return it is, the color is not fit in my room and furniture as well. So I return it and order a new one( lighter color). Still, like it, so choose another color from the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the color options
customer_reviews.text: By far the best color palette on amazon for quality 100% cotton duvet covers. I haven't washed it yet and, in contrary with most of the other reviewers I cannot wait for the shine to go away. Its way too shiny for me before the wash. The pillow covers are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: caco

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool or warn
customer_reviews.text: Love the fabric. During the summer, I remove the insert and in the winter put it back in. Works well year round; i cant sleep without a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this purchase I'm going to order another one. After a year of searching, I've finally found a well made duvet cover. The color was perfect! The fabric feels wonderful and even better after washing. The packaging was elegant and included a fabric bag to store your duvet. Grateful to finally find a duvet luxurious enough to meet my standards!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: overpriced and scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I'm assuming everyone leaving reviews stating that these were the "softest sheets they'd ever felt" are fake reviewers being paid. This duvet was horrible. It was so scratchy I had to take it off in the middle of the night. The button holes were too small for the buttons to fit through so I had to leave it unbuttoned. Immediately boxed it up the next day and returned. Don't get scammed out of $80 for these.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I literally never write reviews because I’m lazy when it comes to this stuff. The only reason I was sold on this was because someone else wrote a similar review. They said something amongst the lines of “if you’re thinking about buying it, and asking is it worth the price, it is.” So I took a chance and honestly it’s soo comfortable. I thought it logical that if I’m going to spend money anywhere it’s important to spend it on a place you spend 30% of your life. So now it’s my turn, if you’re on the fence about the product, It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ALEYDIS DOUGLAS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this duvet! It’s soft, and a tiny bit shiny. I love how well the color matched the sellers photo. Also, my comforter has never come untied from the inside ties used to keep it in place. I couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Wonderal

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with shipping time
customer_reviews.text: Received this today after ordering it last night! Very pleased with shipping time. Immediately impressed with the feel and look of this duvet cover upon opening the package! Did have a strange scent at first but after airing out it went away within 2 hours. Held up nicely on the first wash too! Would buy again! Not as slick as it looks in the pictures but still soft. The twilight mauve is beautiful as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ciera

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful color. And it's soft enough. But it's so thin, already looks worn after 3 or so months, and has a few runs after just gentle use. The buttons are flimsy and don't stay closed. For the quality I would expect this to be $20.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: A great duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: A great duvet cover! It has a beautiful sheen, and the feel of it is so soft! I ordered it for my queen-sized bed and it fits perfectly. Although the price is low, the quality isn't overlooked. If I need another duvet cover I'll probably buy from here again. My only wish is that there was matching sheets from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Brown

customer_reviews.title: The photo doesn't showcase the right color.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Terracotta and I was disappointment to receive a very much lighter and less warm comforter color. However, the quality of the comforter seems to be amazing. It felt really soft. If you are ok with having a cooler and lighter cooler you should go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Amazing feel, breathes well and doesn't feel stuffy, easy to take off and clean, and beautiful color. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Siddiqui

customer_reviews.title: Love this duvet!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use with ties at all four corners. I ordered the woodland green and the color is pretty close to true (on the darker side in the pictures). I did get a stain on it from the first wash even though I only used a gentle detergent. It's small and in the corner, so not too big of a deal though. It's soft and definitely breathable!
customer_reviews.author: Mikala Ross

customer_reviews.title: “Essquite.  endeligance. stylist. luxury. The finest”-snl
customer_reviews.text: This is the second duvet set I buy from them and I still gasp when I take them out of their packaging. The last one was the navy and this one is the mustard yellow. It’s stunning to behold and makes me not want to leave my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft, but still lovely
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful burgundy color and sheen. Not quite as soft as I would have expected. Looks fabulous with my plum colored sheets! Washed and dried, shrunk a bit in width. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, but not super soft or spill-friendly
customer_reviews.text: Looks lovely and expensive. Looks softer than it actually is. Also, avoid any drooling, spilling of water (and probably any excessive sweat and tears) as it will likely “stain” the comforter once it dries. I have not yet washed it to test out if my tears—I mean water stains—come out.
customer_reviews.author: Aware Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, easy to wash, generally wrinkled free and doesnt attract much lint. Very soft, easy close buttons, nice ties to hold insert. (Insert not included, used my normal comforter)
customer_reviews.author: James Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cool
customer_reviews.text: Not a whole lot of bells and whistles... but its a super cool duvet cover. We live in Florida and that cooling piece is absolutely invaluable! Always looks crisp and clean. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna M Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Arrived packaged impressively I knew i would love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s new apartment today she moved in my other daughter was there when we put it on the bed and I had to turn around and order her one in a different color . Beautiful quality true to color shown. I am thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More shrink than Sigmund Freud
customer_reviews.text: Washed cold. Dried medium. Lots of wrinkles and shrinkage. I was expecting something more satiny. What was I thinking with red? With green sheets I could have perma-Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Eyeconic

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dark slate in King and am completely satisfied. High quality product. Material is thick with a beautiful sheen to it. Color is just as pictured. I've been through a million different duvet covers over the years and this one probably tops them all.
customer_reviews.author: RyanRey1980

customer_reviews.title: Soft Sateen high quality thread
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality very comfortable Sateen feeling. I'm very, very impressed! Will buy again in a different color and highly recommend. Wish there were more color options and brighter tones.
customer_reviews.author: Lome Pienaar

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great color and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I love the turquoise color! The duvet itself is similar to having nice sheets. They do wrinkle a bit, it’s gets softer over time. I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this but didn’t love it material does not feel like Egyptian Cotten very rough feeling. Feels cheap and looks cheap looks like a college boys dorm room comforter
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Gorgous
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. Really good quality and washes up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this duvet for over a year now and I am very happy with it. Softer with every wash. Very high quality for the price. And I would consider myself a sheet snob. I only buy the best and I do all the research first.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Swope

product_meta.title: Solid Color Egyptian Cotton Duvet Cover Luxury Bedding Set High Thread Count Long Staple Sateen Weave Silky Soft Breathable Pima Quality Bed Linen (King, Deep Plum)
product_meta.description: Size:King| Color:Deep PlumPlum colors look luscious with olive green, chartreuse, marigold yellow, dark beige and gray. Yellow ocher and metallic gold too. Available in Full/Queen and King size. 100% premium quality Egyptian cotton with a subtle sateen sheen that is not too overbearing. Dense, lightweight, smooth and heavenly soft fabric that won't fade or pill, is easy to care for and will become even softer with every wash. Duvet cover has nonslip corner ties and hidden button closure to keep your comforter insert in place. Machine-wash warm, gentle cycle. Tumble dry on low. Using only non-chlorine when needed. Warm iron as needed. All natural bed linen, healthy, fade and wrinkle resistant colored with environmentally-safe dyes. Matching fitted sheets sold separately
feature_bullets: Luxurious solid colored duvet quilt cover and shams set by designer EIKEI Home
Rich deep plum color that adds modern and warm cozy look to your bedroom at the same time.
400-thread-count Egyptian cotton with a touch of subtle sateen sheen that offers a crisp look with a silky soft feel
King size measures 90 by 106 inch, button closure and hidden inside ties will keep your comforter insert in place. 2 Pillow shams with French flap opening 20 by 36 inch each
Premium quality smooth and lightweight fabric that won't fade or pill, is easy to care for and will become even softer with every wash.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars874 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
